name: Babergh District Council & Mid Suffolk District Council Joint Local Plan – Part 1
organisation-name: Babergh District Council & Mid Suffolk District Council
notes: Joint plan for two districts: Babergh (7,904 homes, 416 p.a.) and Mid Suffolk (10,165 homes, 535 p.a.). This is Part 1 of the plan - allocations to be addressed in future Part 2. Committed housing includes completions 2018-2021 (3,087) plus committed supply at April 2021 (12,821). High level of existing commitments means 94% of requirement already identified through permissions.
